translations.translation: He said, 'In a short while they will be full of regret.'
Answered (the Lord): "They shall wake up repenting soon."
He answered: "A short while, and they shall be repenting."
God replied, "After a very short time they will certainly regret for their deeds."
Said Allah, “They will soon wake up at morn, regretting.”
(Allah) said: "In a little while, they are sure to be regretful."
He said: In a little while they will most certainly be repenting.
He said, 'In a little they will be remorseful.'
He said: In a little while they surely will become repentant.
God said, "Before long they will be filled with regret."
Allah said: after a little while they will become regretful.
Said He, ‘In a little while they will become regretful.’
(Allah) said: "In but a little while, they are sure to be sorry!"
(Allah) said: "In a little while, they are sure to be regretful."
He replied: 'Before long, by the morning, they shall be remorseful'
He said, “Soon they will be filled with regret.”
[Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful."
[23:40] He said, ‘In a little while, of time (‘ammā: the mā is extra), they will become remorseful’, about their disbelief and their denial.
(He said) Allah said: (In a little while they surely will become repentant) they will regret their disbelief when the chastisement seizes them. 377

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالَ } سبحانه: اصبر ولا تستعجل في انتقامهم أهم { عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ } أي: عن زمانٍ قليلٍ { لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ نَادِمِينَ } [المؤمنون: 40] عمَّا فعلوا من التكذيب والإنكار

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { قال } هود، أو صالح - عليهما السلام - بعدما سلك في دعوتهم كل مسلك، متضرعاً إلى الله - عز وجل -: { ربِّ انصرني } عليهم، وانتقم منهم { بما كذَّبونِ } أي: بسبب تكذيبهم إياي وإصرارهم عليه، { قال } تعالى إجابة لدعائه: { عمَّا قليلٍ } أي: عن زمان قليل، زيدت " ما " ، بين الجار والمجرور لتأكيد معنى القلة، أو نكرة موصوفة، أي عن شيء قليل { ليصبِحُنَّ نادمين } عما فعلوا من التكذيب، وذلك عند معاينتهم العذاب
